remarks: The size of the set of closed walks (defined as words) with a fixed length which is a prime number is the product of the number of equivalence classes for ` .~ ` over the set of closed walks and the fixed length.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 17-Jun-2018.)

hashclwwlkn $p |- ( ( V e. Fin /\ V USGrph E /\ N e. Prime ) -> ( # ` W ) = ( ( # ` ( W /. .~ ) ) x. N ) ) $.
